project.name: Arcade Machine
project.summary: Fully functioning old school arcade machine redone using modern technology, custom built with two 8-button joysticks, no-keyboard front end operation and retrofitted working coin door.

project.name: Electronics
project.summary: Electronic has been a hobby of mine for a while now. I like to tinker with different ideas, and the biggest project I ever did was Raspberry Pi controller solar powered attic fan interface.

project.name: 3d printers
project.summary: I am a big 3D print enthusiast, currently I own 4 printers which combined worked over 1000 hours. It's a fantastic new technology that surpirses me every day.
